short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simulates dyslexia. Just how if life gives you melons then you might be dyslexic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There are options to change the chance of words being shuffled as well as how often a piece of text is evaluated. Huge inspiration was taken from geon's dyslexia page: https://geon.github.io/programming/2016/03/03/dsxyliea
